Title: Efficient bug prediction and fix suggestions
Elements_risk_assessment:
SZZ observes each hunk in the bug-fix and assumes that the deleted or modified 
    source code in each hunk is the location of a bug
Summary:
A step-by-step procedure which effectively predicts buggy code changes (Bug Prognosticator), 
    produces bug fix suggestions (Fix Suggester), and utilizes human feedback is presented
Outcome:
The optimized Bug Prognosticator is able to achieve an average 97% precision and 70% recall when 
    evaluated on eleven projects, ten open source and one commercial
